articles.content: Liquid biopsy, a blood-based test for diagnosing cancer, is slowly gaining traction over traditional, more invasive tissue-based biopsies among medical professionals, oncologists and industry experts… [+2732 chars]

articles.author: Kate Wells
articles.title: Labor induction doesn't decrease risk of C-section for full-term pregnancies, study finds - Michigan Radio
articles.description: About 30% of women who had an elective induction had a C-section, compared to about 24% of those who chose expectant management. But the women getting elective inductions tended to be a pretty select group: white women over the age of 35, with private insuran…
